name: Implement Boss Loot Chest Logic
desc:
[Context]
GameSystem: Dungeon
Mode: Dungeon
Subsystem: Loot

When the boss dies in a Dungeon, a locked chest should spawn nearby with randomized loot based on dungeon tier. The player must open it manually. The loot should be randomized but tier-aware and the chest should only appear on boss death, not mini-bosses.
